mapper.update: UPDATE t_store SET supervisorId = NULL,transferMode = '0' WHERE storeId = #{storeId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_store s WHERE s.supervisorId = #{supervisorIdOne};
mapper.update: UPDATE t_store SET supervisorId = #{supervisorId} WHERE supervisorId = #{supervisorIdOne};
mapper.select: SELECT sup.`name`,ts.userId,ts.storeId,ts.storeName,ts.area,ts.supervisorId,ts.phone,ts.address,ts.userName,ts.addTime,ts.process,ts.`status`, ts.storeNo,ts.frontStorePic,ts.longtitude,ts.latitude,ts.storeArea,ts.chain,ts.equipment,ts.storeType,ts.partners,ts.building, IFNULL(ta.totalNum, 0) AS totalNum,IFNULL(ta.totalPrice,0) AS totalPrice,IFNULL(tb.monthPrice,0) AS monthPrice,IFNULL(tb.monthNum,0) AS monthNum,IFNULL(cc.couponNum,0) AS couponNum FROM t_store ts LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,SUM(orderPrice)*0.01 AS totalPrice,COUNT(1) AS totalNum FROM t_order WHERE `status` = 1 AND orderStatus !='-1' GROUP BY userId ) ta ON ts.userId = ta.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId,SUM(orderPrice)*0.01 AS monthPrice,COUNT(1) AS monthNum FROM t_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(orderTime) AND `status` = 1 AND orderStatus !='-1' GROUP BY userId ) tb ON ts.userId = tb.userId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS couponNum , storeId FROM c_coupon GROUP BY storeId )AS cc ON cc.storeId=ts.storeId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor sup ON sup.supervisorNum=ts.supervisorId WHERE ts.`status` = 1 AND ts.storeId =#{0}
SELECT orderId,orderNumber,orderTime,`number`,orderPrice*0.01 AS orderPrice,orderStatus FROM t_order WHERE userId= #{userId} AND `status`=1 AND orderStatus != '-1' ORDER BY orderTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT c.createTime,c.storeId,c.storeName,c.auditStatus,c.orderNum,c.logisticsSingleNum,c.damagedFruit,c.inspectionScene,c.damageDescription,c.amount,i.* FROM c_coupon c LEFT JOIN c_coupon_img i ON c.couponId=i.couponId WHERE c.storeId = #{relationMap.storeId}

SELECT storeId,visitTime,visitManner,visitGoal,visitWith,visitResultStatus,visitResult,updateTime FROM c_visit_record WHERE storeId=#{storeId} AND `status`=0 AND visitResultStatus IS NOT NULL ORDER BY visitTime DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT visitTime,visitManner,visitGoal,visitWith,visitResultStatus,visitResult,updateTime FROM c_visit_record WHERE storeId=#{relationMap.storeId } AND `status`=0 AND visitResultStatus IS NOT NULL
